MemoryInfobox.name: Dead or Alive
MemoryInfobox.description: 'The Con of Kos strikes again! Either the Cerberus takes him, or you do - and get paid.'
MemoryInfobox.conc:
A Business Opportunity
Dead or Alive (Odyssey)|Dead or Alive

General_Description: '''Dead or Alive''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra accepted a quest from the Message Board to hunt down the Con of Kos for the Cerberus.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra accepted the quest.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Lots of contracts about this Con of Kos. Must be a bonehead.''
Kassandra traveled to [[Artemisia Fort]] to find the target.
:(Dialogue continued in [[A Business Opportunity]])
Section_Outcome: The Con of Kos was Markos all along, Kassandra then helped her old friend with a new problem.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
